programme.title: Live Snooker: UK Championship
programme.desc: Coverage of the evening session on day two at York Barbican, featuring two first-round matches, played over the best of 11 frames. Jack Lisowski fought back from 3-0 down to overcome two-time champion Mark Selby 6-4 at this stage last year, and qualifier Wu Yize prevailed by the same scoreline against 13th seed Si Jiahui. The UK Championship is one of the Triple Crown events and always a highlight of the snooker calendar. The roll call of champions in recent years has been varied, with a different winner in each year since the turn of the decade. Ronnie OSullivan is the most successful player in the tournaments history, with eight triumphs, the last of which came in 2023 with a 10-7 victory over Ding Junhui in the final. With commentary and analysis from Steve Davis, John Parrott, Ken Doherty, Dennis Taylor, Stephen Hendry and Kyren Wilson, and reports from Shabnam Younus-Jewell

programme.title: Life of a Mountain: A Year on Scafell Pike
programme.desc: Documentary charting Englands highest peak as it is transformed by the seasons - seen through the eyes of those who climb it for pleasure, those who try to protect its slopes and the Cumbrian farmers who work in the surrounding valleys and fells surrounding the Lake District National Park. Contributions from the British Mountaineering Council and National Trust volunteers highlight the importance of maintaining the landscape for future generations

programme.title: The Age of Uncertainty
programme.desc: Over a relaxed weekend, distinguished guests gather at John Kenneth Galbraiths Vermont farm to offer their views on economics, politics and international relations and other themes outlined in the series, as well other major anxieties facing the world. Those attending were Gyorgy Arbatov, Ralf Dahrendorf, Katharine Graham, Edward Heath, Jack Jones, Henry Kissinger, MR Kukrit Pramoj, Arthur Schlesinger Jr, Hans Selye, Shirley Williams and Thomas Winship

programme.title: The Lost Libraries of Timbuktu
programme.desc: Aminatta Forna presents a documentary examining the literary tradition of Timbuktu in Mali, where hundreds of thousands of manuscripts have come to light in recent years. From the 13th to the 16th centuries, the city was a renowned seat of learning, and its black African scholars were revered throughout the Islamic world

programme.title: Life of a Mountain: A Year on Scafell Pike
programme.desc: Documentary charting Englands highest peak as it is transformed by the seasons - seen through the eyes of those who climb it for pleasure, those who try to protect its slopes and the Cumbrian farmers who work in the surrounding valleys and fells surrounding the Lake District National Park. Contributions from the British Mountaineering Council and National Trust volunteers highlight the importance of maintaining the landscape for future generations

programme.title: Live Snooker: UK Championship
programme.desc: Seema Jaswal presents coverage of the evening session on day three at York Barbican, featuring two first-round matches, played over the best of 11 frames. In last years corresponding session, Jak Jones fought back from 5-3 down to edge past 2023 world champion Luca Brecel 6-5. In contrast, the other match of the session saw Michael Holt comfortably defeat Gary Wilson 6-1, to reach the last 16 of the tournament for the first time since the 1999 event. With commentary and analysis from Steve Davis, John Parrott, Ken Doherty, Dennis Taylor and Stephen Hendry, and reports from Shabnam Younus-Jewell

programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Documentary exploring how Venetians are turning to revolutionary engineering, restoration of the natural environment and knowledge from their past in order to save their city from the impact of climate change

programme.title: Ian Rankins Hidden Edinburgh
programme.desc: Edinburgh is often described as the Athens of the North, but John Rebus, one its most famous detectives, views Scotlands capital in quite a different light - it is a crime scene waiting to happen. In this programme, Rebuss creator Ian Rankin revisits the key locations from the books. From the citys pubic triangle and the home of Scotlands most infamous madam to a police station where Rankin was interviewed about a real murder, the award-winning crime writer explores the hidden Edinburgh into which tourists never venture

programme.title: Wainwright: The Man Who Loved the Lakes
programme.desc: Part-dramatised profile of writer and artist Alfred Wainwright, the enthusiastic fell-walker from Blackburn who became renowned for his pictorial guides to the English Lake District. More than two million copies have been sold since he began writing them in 1955, and they have become the standard reference work for the area

programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Documentary exploring how Venetians are turning to revolutionary engineering, restoration of the natural environment and knowledge from their past in order to save their city from the impact of climate change

programme.title: Ian Rankins Hidden Edinburgh
programme.desc: Edinburgh is often described as the Athens of the North, but John Rebus, one its most famous detectives, views Scotlands capital in quite a different light - it is a crime scene waiting to happen. In this programme, Rebuss creator Ian Rankin revisits the key locations from the books. From the citys pubic triangle and the home of Scotlands most infamous madam to a police station where Rankin was interviewed about a real murder, the award-winning crime writer explores the hidden Edinburgh into which tourists never venture

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights of the latest Premier League matches, including Manchester City v Leeds United at Etihad Stadium and Tottenham Hotspur v Fulham at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. The Citizens will have been expecting three points at home to Leeds as their title challenge continued. Spurs were held to a 1-1 draw at home to Fulham last term, with Tom Cairney equalising for the Cottagers and also getting sent off. Plus, Brentford v Burnley, Sunderland v Bournemouth and Everton v Newcastle United

programme.title: Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg
programme.desc: Interviews with key politicians and public figures

programme.title: Sunday Politics Northern Ireland
programme.desc: Mark Carruthers looks at the political developments of the week and questions policy-makers on the key issues

programme.title: Sunday Morning Live
programme.desc: Sean Fletcher and Jennifer Reoch present topical debate covering religious, moral and ethical issues, with guest panellists and contributions from viewers

programme.title: Prayer and Reflection
programme.desc: A service from Glasgow Central Mosque

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Christina Trevanion presents the show from Newark, and meets a world record-holding collector of tea towels. Raj Bisram and Roo Irvine advise the teams

programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.title: Songs of Praise
programme.desc: On Advent Sunday, Sean Fletcher begins a series of programmes exploring some of the themes of the Advent season, beginning with stories and hymns celebrating hope

programme.title: Points of View
programme.desc: Viewers opinions on BBC shows and behind-the-scenes reports on new programmes

programme.title: Ruby Gillman, Teenage Kraken
programme.desc: Shy teenager Ruby Gillman is a kraken who lives on dry land in Oceanside with parents Arthur and Agatha and her younger brother Sam. A failed prom proposal culminates in Ruby plunging into the sea, and finally she discovers she is destined to inherit the throne from her kraken grandmother. Animated coming-of-age fantasy, featuring the voices of Lana Condor and Jane Fonda

programme.title: Tiddler
programme.desc: Animated adaptation of Julia Donaldson and Axel Schefflers childrens book about a little fish with a big imagination, who gets lost in the deep wide ocean. But his gift for storytelling may be just what he needs to find his way safely home. Narrated by Hannah Waddingham, and featuring the voices of Lolly Adefope, Jayde Adams and Rob Brydon

programme.title: Room on the Broom
programme.desc: Animated adaptation of the childrens book by author Julia Donaldson and illustrator Axel Scheffler, the creators of modern classic The Gruffalo. It tells the story of a kind witch who invites a surprising number of animals to ride on her broom - much to the frustration of her cat. But when a fearsome dragon appears, what will the gang do? Gillian Anderson heads the voice cast as the witch, with Rob Brydon, Martin Clunes, Sally Hawkins and David Walliams as the animals, Timothy Spall as the dragon and Simon Pegg as narrator

programme.title: Kingdom
programme.desc: Lioness Rita is raising the next generation, but caring for her cubs alone leaves them vulnerable while she hunts. The hyenas strength is growing, but a flooded den spells disaster and the clan become separated. Seeking a mate, leopard Olimba begins a new chapter, but in her way is her daughter - she has now become her main rival, and only one can remain

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Weather
programme.desc: The latest forecast

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: John Craven and Vick Hope explore the scenery of the Lake District, following in the footsteps of JMW Turner to mark the 250th anniversary of the great landscape painters birth. They uncover the fells and lakes that inspired Turners art, and see how farming, rural life and tourism have shaped the contours of Cumbria. Plus, Adam Henson takes to the stage at the BBC Food and Farming Awards to crown Countryfiles Young Countryside Champion for 2025

programme.title: Kingdom
programme.desc: An injured wild dog needs the support of his pack more than ever before, but in return he helps to care for Storms largest ever litter of puppies - revealing a new and surprising side to wild dogs. A showdown between mother and daughter sees leopard Olimba struggling to keep a grip on her territory, while the fragmented hyena clan is reuniting and rebuilding their strength

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing
programme.desc: Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman reveal which two celebrities have to compete in the dance-off, knowing one of them wont be making it through to next weeks quarter-final - which is also doubling up as musicals week. While the contestants await their fate, Myles Smith provides the music

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents a round-up of unseen treasures from the past series, including a mask from Phantom of the Opera, Queen Victorias parasol and a telegram from Ringo Starr to one of Scotlands foremost Scottish folk singers, Rab Noakes. Plus, in Stoke-on-Trent, Fiona pays a visit to the VandA Wedgwood Collection

programme.title: Prisoner 951
programme.desc: Nazanins solitary confinement ends, and she finds solace among fellow inmates. In London, a careless comment from an MP risks derailing her case. Richard and Nazanin make an agonising family decision

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Highlights of the latest Premier League matches, including Chelsea v Arsenal at Stamford Bridge and West Ham United v Liverpool at London Stadium. The Blues and Arsenal drew 1-1 in last seasons corresponding fixture and another closely fought contest between the London rivals was anticipated. The Reds won 5-0 at West Ham last term, but the Hammers will have hoped to me more competitive under Nuno Espirito Santo. Plus, Crystal Palace v Manchester United, Aston Villa v Wolverhampton Wanderers and Nottingham Forest v Brighton and Hove Albion

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: The host is joined by eight-time Oscar-nominee Glenn Close, who is joining the cast of Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery. Also on the sofa are Emmy-winning Swedish star Alexander Skarsgard, who is playing a biker in British love story Pillion, actress and national treasure Miriam Margolyes, discussing her anthology The Little Book of Miriam, and Bridgerton star Nicola Coughlan, who is taking to the National Theatre stage. Plus, Jessie J performs HAPPY from her album Dont Tease Me with a Good Time

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Rav Wilding and Louise Minchin present the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Rip Off Britain
programme.sub-title: Tainted Tap Water Left us in Agony
programme.desc: Louise Minchin, Gloria Hunniford and Julia Somerville seek answers for homeowners who say their water company should have acted faster when a dangerous cryptosporidium bug was found in their tap water supply. Customers of a double glazing firm claim theyve been left out in the cold and one well-known supermarket are having trouble with reward points being stolen

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Dion Dublin and Tommy Walsh track the progress on the renovations of a back to front house in Eastbourne and two derelict properties in Grimsby and Worcestershire

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp meets a lady who has spent 30 years repairing well-worn teddy bears. Meanwhile, experts Phil Serrell and Roo Irvine lead their teams at an antiques fair in Southwell

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Newsline; Weather
programme.desc: Local news worth watching from across Northern Ireland

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: The Marvellous Miniature Workshop
programme.desc: Sara Cox presents as a team of expert model-makers bring cherished places from the past back to life in miniature. The first episode features Manchesters now-derelict Crumpsall Library, which is recreated for Leah, a retired social worker who met her late husband there as a teenager

programme.title: Make It at Market
programme.desc: Having spent several years trying to earn a living from pyrography, Chantal feels its her last chance to make her craft pay. After having to give up her sugar-craft shop following a 33-year career, Claire needs to find a new way of earning a living and has her sights set on a new stained-glass business to pay the bills. They both seek advice on how to turn their hobbies into viable careers from Dom Chinea and his team of experts and then have two months to take on board all the tips offered to turn their passions into paying professions

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Ginny Buckley helps a London buyer find her dream home in the Dorset countryside and also meets a family who have turned local fish canning into a coastal success story

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.sub-title: Taylor Pressure Helmet, Industrial Trolley, Art Nouveau Stands
programme.desc: The dealers welcome Scott and Clare from Aberdare, Georges loses his head over a super-rare pilots helmet, and Wallys normal-sized Mini poster proves a huge hit

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Bee Harford makes her debut alongside Raj Bisram in Dorset, where they put their money on a piece of horseshoe-shaped silver, a bit of carved black forest and an equestrian boot

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz in which contestants try to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious correct answers to questions. Presented by Alexander Armstrong, with Stephen Mangan

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: Hope Street
programme.desc: When a widow is assaulted, she gives the police a description of her attackers, though something about her account doesnt ring true. Frustrated by her suspension, Sasha takes out her angst on her ex, Donal. When Marlene tries to talk to Sasha about the kiss they shared, Sasha admits that shes in love with someone else. Clint is devastated when he discovers that his wife Nicole has gone behind his back, while Eve is convinced that somethings going on between her husband Luke and his ex-girlfriend. When Eve and Clint find themselves alone, they begin to see each other in a whole new light

programme.title: If Walls Could Talk
programme.desc: Newry Town Hall has been a site of protest and performance for over a century. From civil rights meetings to pantomimes, punk gigs to same-sex marriages, this beloved building has played a central role in the cultural and social life of the community

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: As the Slaters prepare for Freddie and Annas goodbye celebrations, relations are fraught between Jean and the family. Howie makes a life-changing decision, Lauren moots the idea of having Jimmy christened, and Harry takes Nicolas credit card on false pretences to buy drugs

programme.title: Panorama
programme.sub-title: The Truth About Forever Chemicals - Panorama
programme.desc: Catrin Nye investigates the hidden dangers of PFAS, the so-called forever chemicals found in everyday items like waterproof coats and non-stick pans, as well as in food and water. With exclusive testing, personal stories, and expert interviews, Catrin reveals how these toxic substances can affect our health and contaminate the environment, and asks, if the UK Government is doing enough to keep us safe

programme.title: Prisoner 951
programme.desc: Nazanin is heartbroken when her daughter returns to the UK. Richard must learn to be a dad again and decides to go on hunger strike to get his wife home

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Born in Belfast: A Hip Hop Story
programme.desc: The story of how hip hop rose from Belfasts streets to the global stage. Drawing on archive footage, live performances and candid interviews, the programme charts the evolution of Northern Irelands hip hop scene, from early pioneers like Jun Tzu to a new generation of global artists such as Kneecap and Jordan Adetunji

programme.title: Have I Got News for You
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade guests hosts, with writer and broadcaster Richard Osman and comedian Bella Hull joining team captains Paul Merton and Ian Hislop as they delve into the news. As usual, all concerned poke fun at the weeks headlines

programme.title: Dating Apps: The Inside Story
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the Match Group, the corporation behind some of the worlds biggest online dating apps, and revealing the duplicity at the heart of the matchmaking services on offer. Surveys consistently find the majority of users are seeking long-term and serious relationships. However, this programme reveals how they have been sold a lie, and are manipulated in the pursuit of profit

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Cindy goes looking for answers, Vicki continues to struggle, and Laurens hopes are raised, but all may not be as it seems

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Oscar makes a shocking discovery, tensions continue to rise in the Slater family, and Anna makes Freddie an offer

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Lauren wrestles with a difficult decision, Anthony supports Zoe, and Ian and Elaines feud intensifies

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Anthony looks to the future, Kims slip-up has consequences for Elaine, and the truth dawns on a horrified local

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: A feature-length special to conclude the anniversary celebrations, which stretches from a grey, damp and drizzly London all the way to the sparkling beauty of idyllic Saint Marie. A wealthy shipping magnate is found dead at a Christmas party. Things get stranger when a man in London receives a mysterious Christmas card connected to the victims death. Danny John-Jules makes a return as charismatic Officer Dwayne Myers, with special guests Mathew Baynton, Juliet Stevenson, Stanley Townsend, Jocelyn Jee Esien, Anthony Calf, Tessa Bonham Jones, Elizabeth Tan, Tariq Jordan and Sara Cox joining the regular cast

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: The gun-toting treasure seeker is thrown into a furious battle with a mysterious secret society as she races against time to locate the missing pieces of a legendary artefact that grants the owner the ability to control time. Action adventure based on the video games, starring Angelina Jolie, Daniel Craig, Leslie Phillips, Iain Glen, Chris Barrie and Jon Voight

programme.title: Fake Friend: The Ticket Scammer
programme.desc: The case of a Somerset high-flyer who turned his charm and connections into tools of deception, conning his friends and hundreds of others, while living a life of glamour himself. Through the voices of his victims and event industry insiders, this documentary uncovers the high personal and financial cost of chasing exclusivity, and how easily even the most cautious can be deceived

programme.title: The Kim Kardashian Diamond Heist
programme.desc: The inside story of the 2016 robbery and its impact, with those close to the case revealing details about the crime for the first time. Featuring interviews with friends of the family, police officers and journalists who have followed the case, this documentary recalls the fateful night when the US reality TV star was robbed of millions of dollars worth of jewellery in Paris at gunpoint

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Sitcom about a father and daughter reunited when the latter falls pregnant. Exhausted Gemma, living with her three-month-old daughter, sees her formerly estranged mother Davina move in. Instead of helping, her mum lives an irritatingly carefree life. Meanwhile, father Malcolm is living back at the bedsit, sleeping on an inflatable bed on the landing. Missing her dad and in a state of despair, Gemma conspires with Malcolm and Derek to hatch a plot to oust Davina. Starring Aimee Lou Wood, David Morrissey, Jill Halfpenny and Sarah Hadland

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Longing for her old life, Gemma tries reliving a past night out, only to realise she has changed for ever and misses Sadie. Malcolm assumes babysitting duties, only to find his evening upturned by Derek, who ropes the grandfather into helping him exact revenge on his ex-wife. In an attempt to support his friend, while keeping Sadie safe from all perceived threats, Malcolm panics when Gemma announces she is coming home early. Comedy, starring Aimee Lou Wood, David Morrissey, Jill Halfpenny and Sarah Hadland

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: Single, penniless poet Ruby has recently moved back home to live with her mother, Jen. When their strict Presbyterian neighbours descend on the home for her spoiled sister Elizas engagement party, Rubys only job is to not shame the family. Short, one-off comedy, starring Amy Molloy

programme.title: Fake Friend: The Ticket Scammer
programme.desc: The case of a Somerset high-flyer who turned his charm and connections into tools of deception, conning his friends and hundreds of others, while living a life of glamour himself. Through the voices of his victims and event industry insiders, this documentary uncovers the high personal and financial cost of chasing exclusivity, and how easily even the most cautious can be deceived

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Famous inmates, botched escapes and thefts, and Henry VIIIs favourite executions - theyre all here in a terrifying history of the Tower of London

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: From the Trojan Horse, to Jason and his Argonauts going to find the Golden Fleece, and Zeus going on historical first dates as an ant, Horrible Histories presents mythical mayhem, Greek style

programme.title: The Catch Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May head to Norway to find out how a selection of cars fare when taking part in Winter Olympic events. Their experiments include firing a rocket-powered Mini off a ski jump, tackling the biathlon with 4x4s, staging a game of motorised ice hockey and timing the Jaguar XK in a speed-skating race

programme.title: Dating Apps: The Inside Story
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the Match Group, the corporation behind some of the worlds biggest online dating apps, and revealing the duplicity at the heart of the matchmaking services on offer. Surveys consistently find the majority of users are seeking long-term and serious relationships. However, this programme reveals how they have been sold a lie, and are manipulated in the pursuit of profit

programme.title: Fake Friend: The Ticket Scammer
programme.desc: The case of a Somerset high-flyer who turned his charm and connections into tools of deception, conning his friends and hundreds of others, while living a life of glamour himself. Through the voices of his victims and event industry insiders, this documentary uncovers the high personal and financial cost of chasing exclusivity, and how easily even the most cautious can be deceived

programme.title: Ashley Cain: Into the Danger Zone
programme.desc: The former footballer visits some of the worlds most dangerous cities to explore the issues that affect young men born into a life on the fringes of society. He begins in the favelas of Rio, Brazil, where he learns what it takes to become a lookout, foot soldier and drug dealer in a world where death could become reality at any moment. He also comes face-to-face with a gun-toting militia boss to uncover how these men rule through fear and intimidation

programme.title: Ashley Cain: Into the Danger Zone
programme.desc: South Africa has for years battled the scourge of rhino poaching, fuelled by insatiable demand for their horns in Asia. Ashley embarks on a mission to find out who is behind these acts, discovering how the challenges young men face growing up in deprived rural communities can lead them into poaching

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Fraudster
programme.desc: How a 16-year-old used his job in a call centre in Glasgow to go on a five-year crime wave, defrauding innocent cardholders and laying the groundwork for a life of wealth, first-class travel and an escape from the life he was destined for

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Fraudster
programme.desc: Between the ages of 17 and 21, Elliot Castro managed to commit fraudulent activity amounting to a estimated £2 million. This documentary continues his story. With a trail of crime stretching across several continents as he continued to live life on the run, then 18-year-old Elliot became more paranoid than ever and a stint in foreign jail seemed just around the corner

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Fraudster
programme.desc: After four years travelling the world spending fraudulently accrued money, it seems inevitable that Elliot will be deported into the hands of British police, who have put together an extensive case of his crimes. Once again though, he has other ideas. In truth, the one thing Elliot desires as much as freedom is a settled life. But even when he thinks hes found it, with a new home and friends, there is no escape from his trail of lies and deception. Eventually, justice seems set to catch up with him

programme.title: The Kim Kardashian Diamond Heist
programme.desc: The inside story of the 2016 robbery and its impact, with those close to the case revealing details about the crime for the first time. Featuring interviews with friends of the family, police officers and journalists who have followed the case, this documentary recalls the fateful night when the US reality TV star was robbed of millions of dollars worth of jewellery in Paris at gunpoint

Stan, Katie, Rosie, Max and the baby, along with Rufus the dog, all embark on a quest to find some bears. Trekking through whirling snowstorms, muddy bogs and dark forests, the siblings refuse to let anything get in their way. However, when Rosie and Rufus get lost, bear-hunting suddenly doesnt seem quite so much fun after all. Featuring the voices of Olivia Colman, Pam Ferris and Mark Williams as Mum, Grandma and Dad respectively

programme.title: Terry Pratchetts The Abominable Snow Baby
programme.desc: David Harewood narrates this animated adaptation of the short story about a small town where the Christmas festivities are thrown into upheaval by the appearance of a 14-foot snow monster. The creature is adopted by a kindly grandmother, but not everyone is pleased with her new guest. With the voices of Julie Walters and Hugh Dancy

programme.title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea
programme.desc: Hand-drawn animated version of Judith Kerrs much-loved tale, which celebrated its 50th anniversary in 2018. A tea-guzzling tiger turns up unannounced and eats and drinks young Sophie and her mummy out of everything in the house, even draining the water from their taps. Narrated by David Walliams, with David Oyelowo providing the voice for the big cat alongside seven-year-old Clara Ross as Sophie, with other characters played by Benedict Cumberbatch, Tamsin Greig and Paul Whitehouse

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great New Years Bake Off 2022
programme.desc: Noel Fielding, Matt Lucas, Prue Leith and Paul Hollywood invite four former contestants to return to the tent in the hope of being crowned the first Star Baker of 2023. The hopefuls are 2021 finalist Chigs, 2020s Lottie and Manon and Antony from 2018. To help see in the new year, the bakers, family and friends are entertained by the cast of Riverdance

programme.title: Inside McVities at Christmas
programme.desc: One of Britains best-known biscuit brands gear up for their busiest time of year. Facing an ultra-competitive Christmas market, this programme reveals how McVities attempt to stay ahead of their rivals, including a very special twist on the iconic Penguin bar and the creation of a brand-new product - the white chocolate digestive

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Christmas
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jamie Oliver demonstrates festive recipes, beginning with cheesy filo parcels with a cranberry dip, and a cauliflower lasagne using the hasselback technique and a festive jerk-inspired rub, paired with chicken, sausage and bacon party kebabs to get his guests in the party mood. Jamie also mixes up walnuts, Medjool dates and festive spices to make a sticky toffee coffee pudding

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Christmas
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jamie invites his family to join him in his outdoor kitchen shed and makes smoked trout pâte, served with red cabbage slaw and a giant Yorkshire pudding for sharing. He gives the traditional turkey a run for its money with festive porchetta, crispy root veg and roast potatoes, and also takes a Christmas staple to new heights in his vegetarian main, a chestnut and Brussels sprouts pie

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: A Very British Hotel
programme.sub-title: A Very British Hotel at Christmas
programme.desc: Cameras go behind the scenes at Browns, Londons oldest luxury hotel, during the Christmas season, as staff face the expectations of delivering a luxury festive stay for guests booking rooms that start at £750 a night. The hotels elite team hosts a vibrant charity Christmas fayre, creates imaginative festive pastries, and concocts a signature holiday cocktail, all aimed at delivering the Christmas feast of a lifetime

programme.title: Game of Wool: Britains Best Knitter

Only six knitters are left, and one more will be cast off this week

Her pioneering clinical trials feature Trevor, a retired Navy veteran whose skin cancer has spread. Could Sarahs immunotherapy trial save Trevors life? programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A new VW Golf is reported stolen from a rental firm and Chris Lock is soon behind the vehicle, but its driver proves a handful and an armed response unit is called in to assist. programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: A special edition focusing on people driving under the influence, with officers clamping down on young drivers and repeat offenders losing control while drink driving and putting lives in danger. Police respond to a call about a vehicle crashing into several parked cars, while a suspected drink-driver heads towards Derby city centre at 100 miles an hour, and officers arrest a woman whose breathalyser test is over the limit, but who says she needs to get home to her child who has been left at home alone

programme.title: Inside the Force
programme.desc: Officers at Middlesbrough police station must deal with the realities of drug abuse in a town with one of the highest drug-related deaths in Europe. A man crashes a car into a garden wall and flees, but once arrested, there is suspicion he might be under the influence of drugs. Police are also called to the sudden death of a 41-year-old woman who is a known drug user and its suspected she overdosed. But when questioning three people in the house, their stories dont seem to add up, and they are all arrested on suspicion of administering a noxious substance

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Nottingham, three rival couples compete to host the best dinner party and win £1,000. Ultra-competitive accountants Omer and Adeeba serve up an experimental Asian menu. Sustainable food growers Bobby and Alison, who live in a yurt in the grounds of a grand stately home, dish out homegrown, organic food under the stars. On the final night, Liz and Stuart host, and Stuart realises that it might be an uphill battle to impress their rivals. None of their guests is aware that Stuart and Liz dont actually live together, but questions are raised when Adeeba and Alison dont find any of Stuarts clothes in the master bedroom, and Omer and Bobby discover Stuarts campervan with a double bed parked outside

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In the West Country, three rival couples compete to host the best dinner party. On the first night, handyman Sam and his wife Kate attempt a restaurant quality meal. On night two, proud Somerset pair Colin and Kate host at their family farm and serve pork sourced from Colins brothers pig farm. On the final night, festival lovers Aron and Kath put on a beach-themed dinner party, and although they are confident about their culinary prowess, disaster strikes on not one, but two courses. The rest of their meal comes together well, but is it enough to bag the cash prize of £1,000?

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Mojito, a Cuban cafe in Brooklyn, New York. The restaurant was the shared dream of two newlyweds who have separated since its opening, and whose constant public quarrelling is distracting staff and driving customers away

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay visits family-run Luigis in Orange County, California, where lazy shortcuts following the retirement of the owners father have led the business to suffer. Ramsay faces the daunting task of reuniting a feuding family, before turning around the struggling restaurant, which currently has 126 dishes on the menu

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay heads to the Parks Edge restaurant in Atlanta, Georgia, where a series of spats with the local community are hampering its success. Owners Richard and Jorges in-fighting has alienated locals, and the duos suggestion that customer numbers are low because of racism has heightened tensions

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay heads to the Greek at the Harbour restaurant in southern California, where owner Makis Mikelatos works 17 hours a day, seven days a week, but is unwilling to let his son Ari take the reins. Gordon sets out to get to the bottom of Makiss reluctance to teach his son, and uncovers a shocking family secret

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay heads to Mike and Nellies Steakhouse in Oakhurst, New Jersey, where owner Mike Farber is mourning his father Nellie, who was also his business partner. Having been called in by the restaurateurs two daughters, Gordon faces the task of getting him to focus on his business, before tackling the bigger problem of rotting decor and a less-than-appealing menu

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.title: Father Ted

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa takes offence at a new doll that supposedly demeans women, and persuades its inventor to design a more up-to-date version, hoping to provide young girls with a positive role model. Featuring the guest voice of Kathleen Turner

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Nasa decides to send an average American into space as a publicity stunt - but the chances of success are jeopardised when Homer is selected for the honour. Featuring the guest voices of Buzz Aldrin and James Taylor

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: Summer Sausage, a Pocket Poncho and Tony Danza
programme.desc: While Sheldon is busy obsessing over the status of Meemaws budding relationship with his mentor Dr John Sturgis, George and Mary attempt to bond with their other children. Comedy spin-off prequel to The Big Bang Theory, starring Iain Armitage

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: Vanilla Ice-Cream, Gentlemen Callers and a Dinette Set
programme.desc: Meemaw is pursued by two gentlemen callers, only for Sheldon to interfere, forcing her to set some ground rules. Richard Kind and Wallace Shawn guest star, with Iain Armitage

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Haley takes Alex to a concert, where not only does she get her sister drunk, but she also inadvertently introduces her to a sleazy guy going by the name of Weasel. Dad Phil reluctantly accepts that hes no spring chicken after watching Luke outperform him at everything, and Gloria challenges Jay to give up cigars, which he accepts - if she agrees to stop watching her soap operas. A school talent show leads to a catfight between Cam and a rival teacher

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.sub-title: We Need to Talk About Lily
programme.desc: Phil thinks he has come up trumps by finding Pepper his dream home, while Mitch and Cam try to connect with Lily by getting invited to an exclusive event for her favourite vlogger

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly and Murray fall out over Barrys plan to perform his martial arts routine at the annual high school talent show. Pops buys Erica an electric guitar, urging her to take to the stage and sing. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly complains that Pops is spending too much time with her at home, so Murray takes him to work at the furniture shop. Meanwhile, Adam reluctantly gives away his old toys in an effort to make him look more grown up, hoping it will result in a kiss with Dana. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin

programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Expedition Borneo
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of the island of Borneo is a lost world of mountains, jungles and ravines which hide a vast abundance of wildlife. Here a team of scientists, climbers and wildlife film-makers gather to explore this extraordinary habitat before it is too late, as felling the rainforest for tropical timber and converting the land to oil palm plantations threaten this extraordinary ecosystem

programme.title: Expedition Borneo
programme.desc: One team searches for elephants, but the unforgiving parasites and leeches of the jungle begin to take their toll. Elsewhere, the mountaineers become lost on a remote peak

programme.title: Expedition Borneo
programme.desc: The team continues its exploration of Borneo, an expedition aimed at tracking down and filming the animals that live there. The adventurers go in search of wild orang-utan and experience a close encounter with a giant python, and one team member is bitten by a coral snake

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall
programme.desc: The naturalist leads an expedition into an unexplored desert canyon in the Jebel Akhdar mountain range of Oman. With temperatures soaring, dehydration and heat stroke are a constant threat

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his post-war exploration of northwest England in Bradford, Shipley and Hebden Bridge. In Bradfords Centenary Square, he encounters local literary giant, JB Priestley. At Shipley station, Michael discovers a nature reserve in the middle of the car park. Finally the Calder Valley Line delivers the presenter to the photogenic station at Hebden Bridge

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: A young womans chaotic life becomes more complicated when she inherits her grandmothers dog. Comedy, starring Beattie Edmondson, Ed Skrein, Jennifer Saunders and Cherie Lunghi

programme.title: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: A crossbreed dog stolen from his Californian home and taken north to the Yukon, where there is great demand for strong dogs to pull sleds in the frozen wilderness. As his new owner ventures deeper into the Arctic circle, the dog must rediscover his primal nature as a wild animal to survive. Historical adventure based on Jack Londons novel, starring Harrison Ford and Omar Sy

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: The ragtag soldiers of the Walmington-on-Sea Home Guard are given the chance to prove their mettle by apprehending three German aviators who have parachuted into the country in the vanguard of a suspected Nazi invasion. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Arthur Lowe, John Le Mesurier, Clive Dunn, Bill Pertwee, Ian Lavender and Arnold Ridley

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A boy has to fend for himself when he is accidentally left behind after his family jets off to Paris for Christmas. The youngster initially enjoys his freedom, but is soon forced to resort to ingenious booby traps to defend the family home from two dim-witted burglars. Comedy, starring Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Catherine OHara and John Candy

programme.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
programme.desc: Hapless youngster Kevin somehow manages to catch the wrong plane and finds himself heading for New York, while his family jets off to Florida. Having got his hands on his fathers credit card, he is enjoying the good life staying in a luxury hotel - until he bumps into two familiar burglars with an axe to grind. Comedy sequel, starring Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, Brenda Fricker and Tim Curry

programme.title: The Northman
programme.desc: Prince Amleth, the son of the murdered Viking King Aurvandill War-Raven, heads to cold, windswept Iceland to retrieve what was stolen from him - a father, a mother, and a kingdom. Amleth embarks on a murderous quest to find the hateful adversary, whose life is for ever woven together with his by the hands of fate. Historical adventure, starring Alexander Skarsgard, Nicole Kidman, Claes Bang and Ethan Hawke

programme.title: Free Guy
programme.desc: Guy lives a fairly monotonous life as a bank employee. That is until he meets the girl of his dreams and realises hes a non-player character within a massive open world video game. Does he deviate from the life hes always lived or does he follow his dream girl into the unknown future? Adventure comedy, starring Ryan Reynolds, Jodie Comer, Taika Waititi and Lil Rel Howery

programme.title: Werewolves Within
programme.desc: A proposed gas pipeline divides the small town of Beaverfield. The day its residents meet at the local inn, a severe snowstorm batters the area, trapping everyone inside the establishment. As tensions between the opposing sides heighten, it is up to forest ranger Finn and postal worker Cecily to keep the peace and find out the person responsible for the appearance of a mysterious creature that is terrorising the community. Horror comedy, starring Sam Richardson and Milana Vayntrub

programme.title: Carrington VC
programme.desc: A decorated Army major resorts to embezzling mess funds to make ends meet - an act that leaves him facing a court martial, with the evidence stacked against him. To make matters worse, his wife sees the opportunity to get revenge for his wartime affairs by providing false testimony for the prosecution. Courtroom drama, starring David Niven, Margaret Leighton, Noelle Middleton, Laurence Naismith and Clive Morton

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: A sailor learns his involvement in smuggling has made him the chief suspect in a murder case, and reluctantly goes on the run. Ealing thriller, starring Bonar Colleano, Susan Shaw, Renee Asherson and James Robertson Justice

programme.title: The Fallen Idol
programme.desc: An ambassadors son idolises his fathers butler, and tries to throw the police off his scent when he is suspected of murder. However, the boys actions only make the servant seem more suspicious, and he begins to realise that his hero may have deceived him. Crime drama, starring Ralph Richardson and Bobby Henrey

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: A father brings up his baby girl as a single dad after the unexpected death of his wife who died a day after their daughters birth. Comedy drama, starring Kevin Hart and Alfre Woodard

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson as a one-time geek who suffered constant humiliation at high school but grew up to be a lethal CIA agent. But when he is targeted by his own organisation, he comes home for a high school reunion, where he enlists the help of the former campus tough guy - now a meek accountant - who very quickly wonders what he has got himself into. Co-starring Kevin Hart and Amy Ryan

programme.title: Violent Night
programme.desc: Santa Claus materialises down the chimney of greedy matriarch Gertrude Lightstone just as criminal mastermind Mr Scrooge storms the mansion on Christmas Eve with an army of goons to steal 300million US dollars from the Lightstone family vault. Action comedy, starring David Harbour, John Leguizamo, Beverly DAngelo and Alex Hassell

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: A cops career is seemingly over when he accidentally shoots a hostage while thwarting a bank robbery. He is given the chance to redeem himself by joining an elite unit headed by a veteran sergeant. Their mission is to escort an international crime lord in custody as he is taken to prison. However, they hit a snag when their prisoner offers a multimillion-dollar reward to anyone who breaks him out of jail, placing them under attack from every criminal in the city. Action thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Mothering Sunday
programme.desc: A maid living in post-First World War England secretly plans to meet with the man she loves while her employers are away, seizing a last chance to be together before he leaves to marry another woman. Romantic drama, starring Odessa Young, Josh OConnor, Colin Firth and Olivia Colman

programme.title: Five Guns West
programme.desc: Five convicted outlaws, all facing the gallows, are offered a last minute reprieve by the Confederacy - provided they undertake a dangerous mission. An intelligence agent has switched sides to support the North, and must be captured alive, along with the shipment of gold hes carrying. But the temptation to run off with the loot is hard to resist. Western, starring John Lund, Dorothy Malone, Touch Connors and Paul Birch

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell present the stories of three men brought up in the care system who are trying to reconnect with the families that were taken from them. Murray Phillips was adopted from a childrens home as a young boy with his older brother Ricky, who was sent back to the childrens home when he was 12, leaving nine-year-old Murray completely devastated and confused. Eighty-seven-year-old Mark Chesterfield spent a large part of his childhood at a foundling hospital and has been trying to reclaim his identity ever since he found out at the age of 74 that he wasnt an orphan, as hed always believed, but had a mother whod wanted to be part of his life. programme.desc: Kersey and Lane investigate the death of a fisherman, who was killed while at sea, and find EC quotas are taking their toll in more ways than one. programme.title: Christmas Lights
programme.desc: Robson Green and Mark Benton star in this comedy-drama about what can happen when families forget what the festive season is really about. Competitive brothers-in-law Colin and Howard live three doors apart on a suburban street - when Colin puts Christmas lights outside his house, Howard responds with a bigger and brighter set that unleashes a war of twinkling lightbulbs and neon displays which threatens to ruin both families.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Mr Carson and Mrs Hughes wedding is fast approaching, but a misunderstanding threatens to derail the occasion, and when the big day arrives it also brings a few unexpected guests. Meanwhile, Edith reconnects with an old acquaintance, who comes to her aid in her hour of need, and over at the Dower House, Spratt has something to hide, meaning Denker is hot on his trail. Daisy jumps to conclusions about one of the countesss plots, and tensions mount over the hospital takeover, prompting Isobel to offend a friend. Period drama, starring Jim Carter, Phyllis Logan, Elizabeth McGovern and Laura Carmichael

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Tom and Sybbie return to Downton, but the peace is disrupted by an unexpected visit from an old friend. programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Neville Chamberlain visits Downton for dinner, and is drawn into Violets plan to save the hospital, with distressing consequences for everyone. Mrs Hughes struggles to keep Carson happy, while Mary thinks secrets are being kept from her

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The house is made open to the public for a day to raise money for the hospital, an act that divides opinions among the family and the servants. Tensions between Violet and Cora come to a head as a decision is made about the hospital takeover, Mr Dawes has a proposition for Molesley, and Baxter is thrown into turmoil by an unexpected letter. Carson is not happy with Thomas, but all is not as it appears, while Mary and Edith hope to overcome their past and find new happiness with the men in their lives

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The Crawleys watch Henry compete in a motor racing event, an occasion that leaves Mary reeling. Violet hatches a plan which surprises the family and delights Miss Denker, and learns more about Amelias intentions in befriending Isobel. Molesley and Daisy rise to the challenges of examination day, Andys secret is brought to light, Thomas feels isolated, and Mrs Patmore and Mrs Hughes teach Carson a lesson

programme.title: Endeavour
programme.desc: A mysterious fire that killed an artist with links to political activists leaves the police baffled, while Bright finds himself short-staffed when a stomach bug puts most of his men on sick leave. The situation becomes more serious when a housewife dies of the same condition. Endeavour investigates a family-run supermarket, believing the infection may have stemmed from their stock being deliberately contaminated, and discovers dark secrets that may have a connection to the unexplained blaze

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Gerald Hadleigh, the secretary of the local writers circle in the tranquil village of Midsomer Worthy, is found battered to death on the eve of a visit by a best-selling novelist. Barnaby and Troy discover Hadleigh was a mystery man, with no relatives or marriage certificate to match the wedding photo on display in his house. To make matters worse, another body is then found. Mystery, guest starring Anna Massey and Una Stubbs

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lizzy Swann is found dead at the bottom of a cliffside coastal walkway, but what appears at first to be a terrible accident, quickly becomes a murder investigation as Vera discovers evidence the body has been tampered with. Interviews with those who knew Lizzy paint a troubling picture of a guarded and paranoid woman who seemed to be burning bridges with friends and family alike in the days leading up to her death

programme.title: Mr Bates vs the Post Office
programme.desc: After a new computer system called Horizon is installed across the country, mysterious financial losses start to appear in village post office tills. But when subpostmasters Alan Bates, Jo Hamilton, Noel Thomas and Lee Castleton seek help, the Post Office insists that each of them is the only one having problems. Alan, stubborn and computer-literate, refuses to put it behind him and is sure that one day hell find the evidence to prove them wrong. Bafta award-winning, fact-based drama, starring Toby Jones, Monica Dolan and Julie Hesmondhalgh

programme.title: Mr Bates vs the Post Office
programme.desc: Alan and his friends meet Sam Kaur, who is due to stand trial, and Michael Rudkin, who has insider knowledge of Horizon. Jo and Alan take their cause to Westminster where James Arbuthnot MP persuades the Post Office to hire an independent investigator. Bob Rutherford becomes convinced of the honesty of the subpostmasters as he starts work and finds evidence of faults in the IT systems, his report rattles Paula Vennells who approaches Alan to find a solution

programme.title: The End of the World with Beanz
programme.desc: People have always cared about their appearance, but in the age of social media, many seem to be in the pursuit of perfection. Martin Beanz Warde is joined by actress Norma Sheahan to explore the ever increasing pursuit of physical perfection, a journey that sees one of them try botox for the first time. Beans also travels to Germany to meet a man undergoing an aesthetic procedure that is both transformational and terrifying

programme.desc: Life in the Permian period, when massive geologic changes produced voracious sabre-toothed carnivores like Gorgonopsid and the terrifying 40-foot shark Helicoprion

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: In St Agnes, the crew is involved in a race against time to rescue two young men. They are reported to be struggling in the water near a notorious headland known as Tubbys Head. In Whitby, North Yorkshire, Leah is training to be the stations first female helm, and her skills are put to the test when she is called out to rescue a walker whos fallen and injured her leg on inaccessible rocks by the seal colony at Ravenscar

programme.title: Earth
programme.desc: Chris Packham tells the story of how plant life turned Earth from a barren rock into a vibrant green world - a 4.5 billion-year saga of extraordinary highs and lows that almost wiped out all life. He reveals how a giant asteroid bombardment triggered Earths plate tectonics, leading to huge fungi, soil and giant swamp forests, but the early plants locked in so much carbon dioxide that global temperatures suddenly plunged

programme.title: Lost Pyramids of the Aztecs
programme.desc: Part one of two. Archaeologists unearth the remains of the ancient civilisation from beneath Mexico City, digging deeper than ever before to find out who the Aztecs were and how they built their remarkable empire. The first episode features an attempt to build a replica of a pyramid, as well as investigating the mysterious pyramid ruins being unearthed in the heart of Mexico City and a journey into a set of underground tunnels that have lain undisturbed for centuries

programme.title: The Korean War
programme.desc: Part one of two. Shedding new light on one of the most perilous episodes in post-war history, examining how and why its legacy - a tense stalemate - continues to this day. Beginning with 35 years of brutal Japanese occupation, a sudden and arbitrary division of the 1,000 year-old nation in 1945, followed by three more years of occupation by the USSR in the North and the US in the South

programme.title: Grand Indian Hotel
programme.desc: Behind the scenes at one of the most exclusive hotel groups in the world, following staff in four Indian hotels, as they strive to deliver luxury for their VIP guests. In Jaipur, new recruits prepare for the most important event of the year, a lavish dinner for the Maharaja of Jaipur. As managers work out how to deal with incontinent elephants, the young waiting staff must put on the biggest show of their careers

programme.title: Conspiracy Theory

However, when one of them turns out to be true, assassins are put on his trail to prevent the secret from being exposed. programme.title: Battle of the Irish Dancers
programme.desc: Documentary following dedicated dancers and their teachers as they prepare for the Irish Dancing Championships in Dublin

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: A profile of the English actor, who found fame in TV drama Brideshead Revisited before starring in films including The Mission, and Reversal of Fortune, for which he won an Oscar

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A fortune teller sees her own destiny in the cards of a man who has just arrived in town

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected
programme.desc: A couple encounter a shady mechanic while making a trip across the desert

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A rebellious teenage girl uses any means, even murder, to get free of the overly protective aunt who is raising her

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A married couple stand to inherit £30,000 when the wifes aunt dies while they are out riding, but while in Mexico their car with her body inside is stolen

programme.title: Andre Rieu: Power of Love
programme.desc: A 2024 concert in the violinists home town of Maastricht

programme.title: Andre Rieu: Welcome to My World
programme.desc: The violinist celebrates Christmas at his Winter Palace in Maastricht, performing the Little Drummer Boy and more Christmas classics with his Johann Strauss Orchestra

programme.title: Classic FM Live: A Film Music Spectacular
programme.desc: The Bournemouth Symphony Orchestra and the Ukrainian conductor Kirill Karabits perform popular film themes from the Royal Albert Hall including Star Wars and Jurassic Park

programme.title: Charles Hazlewood: Beethoven and Me
programme.desc: The conductor uses Beethovens Fiftth Symphony as a starting point to explore the work, genius and various health conditions that both influenced and disrupted the composers work

programme.title: Voices of Ireland
programme.desc: Part two of two. Imelda May explores Irelands rich history of literary talent, with writers often inspired by a land embellished with natural beauty

programme.title: The Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde
programme.desc: Concerned by Dr Jekylls behaviour, Gabriel Utterson works to uncover the identity of the dangerous Mr Hyde. National Theatre of Scotlands retelling of RL Stevensons gothic tale

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Pat Seddon considers selling up and visits a clairvoyant, while celebrity chef Mitch Tonks makes an appearance at Brixhams Crab Festival

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Maritime Inn landlady Pat gets her first full house of the season as Brixhams tourist trade picks up for the summer - but refuses to hire anyone to help her with the extra work. Powerboat instructor Mike Weatherbee tries to enforce the laws of the sea, carpet-cleaner Dave Satchwill prepares to lead the towns popular ghost tour, and lone fisherman Dave Brown reveals his unusual methods

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: August arrives and the fishermen of Brixham spend time ashore with their families as their boats are repaired - but summer proves costly for Jan, who loses £1,000 for every day his vessel is out of action. Apprentice deckhand Logan has to decide whether a life at sea is the right choice for him and his family, and seafood seller Jenny receives a surprise on her 65th birthday

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The fate of Jon Snow is revealed, Ramsay sends his dogs after Theon and Sansa, while Ellaria and the Sand Snakes make their move

programme.title: Game of Thrones

programme.title: Game of Thrones

Fantasy drama, starring Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, John Bradley, Hannah Murray and Maisie Williams

programme.title: All Her Fault
programme.desc: Alcaras struggles to balance work and home life and must make a choice when he is tempted by an offer that goes against his morals

programme.desc: As Prior digs into the links between Tsalal and mining company Silver Sky, Navarro rescues Leah from a local protest that has turned violent. Later, Hank receives a quid pro quo offer

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: Ziggy loses his prized car to some drug dealers who dismiss his excuses for not paying up. Daniels sends his detail out to conduct raids as the investigation of the docks is stepped up, while Beadie gets a lead from an ex-boyfriend on how cargo disappears from the port. With business in the projects suffering due to weak product, Stringer gets useful advice from his economics professor

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Paul has his first session with Oliver, a boy whose parents are divorcing - but the therapist is stunned to discover that they have yet to tell their son themselves. However, Pauls attempt to talk to them alone only results in more bickering. Drama, starring Gabriel Byrne

programme.desc: Shiv weighs a proposal from Matsson ahead of Waystars Investor Day, while Kendall and Roman try to match Logans leadership style

programme.desc: Lord and Lady Fitzalan Howard try to impress American guests at Carlton Towers with a programme of traditional activities, including skinning rabbits and taking high tea. Meanwhile, Sir Humphry Wakefield entertains tourists on a wine-tasting weekend at Chillingham Castle

However, he quickly loses his temper when he learns the therapist cannot provide him with the instant answers he desires. Drama, starring Gabriel Byrne

Meanwhile, Carlton Towers in East Yorkshire hosts an annual dog show for Afghan hounds

programme.desc: A youngster called Chan Lok-kwan accidentally enters the Walled City, discovers the order amidst its chaos, and learns important life lessons along the way. Chinese crime thriller with subtitles, starring Raymond Lam, Louis Koo and Sammo Hung

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: A battle-hardened special forces operative attempts to rescue his kidnapped niece when a mercenary mission spirals into chaos. Action thriller, starring Eden Brolin, Andy Garcia and Melissa Leo

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his fathers death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton

programme.title: Wrath of the Titans
programme.desc: The Greek god Zeus is betrayed by his fellow immortals, who intend to release the monstrous race of titans they banished to the underworld. His Demi-God son Perseus must rescue his father and protect the human race from the terrifying creatures that have been unleashed on the world. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: With the imminent destruction of their home planet approaching, a man and his wife seek to preserve their race by sending their infant son to Earth. The childs spacecraft lands at the farm of Jonathan and Martha Kent, who name him Clark and raise him as their own son. Though his extraordinary abilities have led to the adult Clark living on the fringe of society, he is forced to take a stand to protect his adopted home from a fanatical general from his own world, who intends to wipe out the human race. Sci-fi adventure based on the Superman comic-books, starring Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Michael Shannon and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: The shape-changing robots and their human allies face a confrontation with their original creator, who has brainwashed their leader and intends to save her own home planet by destroying Earth. To save the human race they must recover an ancient artefact from Arthurian legend - but their mission is threatened by old enemies as they uncover a terrible secret about the history of the world. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Mark Wahlberg, Anthony Hopkins, Gemma Chan, Stanley Tucci and John Turturro

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Down-and-out stuntman Colt Seavers sets out to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriends blockbuster. Action comedy based on Lee Majors 1980s TV series, starring Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Hannah Waddingham

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: News of a friends murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian OConner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Marcus Garan is a part of a group of hitmen who are contracted to take out a notorious killer, only to find out theyre being hunted. Writer/director Kevin Greviouxs action thriller, starring Frank Grillo, Alain Moussi, Marie Avgeropoulos and Stephen Dorff

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A thwarted Nazi experiment lands the Allies with an unexpected visitor from another dimension in the form of a bright-red demon. A secretive US government agency fosters the little devil and he grows up to be its crucial weapon against the forces of darkness - but the re-emergence of the sinister wizard Rasputin proves a challenge even for him. Action fantasy based on the comic-book series, with Ron Perlman, John Hurt, Selma Blair and Karel Roden.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers, he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. Action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Jeremy Irons, Minnie Driver and Jemma Redgrave

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: The shape-changing robots and their human allies face a confrontation with their original creator, who has brainwashed their leader and intends to save her own home planet by destroying Earth. To save the human race they must recover an ancient artefact from Arthurian legend - but their mission is threatened by old enemies as they uncover a terrible secret about the history of the world. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Mark Wahlberg, Anthony Hopkins, Gemma Chan, Stanley Tucci and John Turturro

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Down-and-out stuntman Colt Seavers sets out to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriends blockbuster. Action comedy based on Lee Majors 1980s TV series, starring Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Hannah Waddingham

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: While exploring space for new worlds, a probe belonging to the Life Foundation discovers a comet covered in symbiotic lifeforms. Following the probes return to Earth, journalist Eddie Brock investigates sinister trials being carried out by the corporation, and after being infected by an alien symbiote, develops superhuman strength and power. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy and Riz Ahmed

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: Struggling to cope with his alter ego Venom, Eddie Brock attempts to re-ignite his journalistic career by interviewing serial killer Cletus Kasady. However, Kasady becomes the host of the symbiote Carnage and escapes prison after a failed execution. Comic-book fantasy sequel, directed by Andy Serkis and starring Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson and Michelle Williams

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venoms hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Stephen Graham and Juno Temple

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago. Fantasy adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, Naomie Harris and Malin Akerman

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A boy watching an action movie is transported into the film by a magic ticket and meets its hero figure, who refuses to believe he is a fictional character. Matters take a turn for the worse when the screen villain gets hold of the ticket and crosses over into the real world - where bad guys can win. Comedy adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Austin OBrien, Charles Dance, F Murray Abraham and Anthony Quinn

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A silver dragon named Firedrake and his friends search for a mythical safe haven hidden in the Himalayas. Animated family adventure based on the novel by Cornelia Funke, featuring the voices of Felicity Jones, Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Patrick Stewart and Freddie Highmore

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: A tribe of perpetually happy fuzzy-headed creatures are kidnapped by a race of giants who intend to eat them. The princess of the clan escapes and plans a rescue mission - but to save her friends, she will need the help of a grumpy troll with a loathing of music who has rejected their joyful culture to live as a loner. Animated musical, with the voices of Anna Kendrick and Justin Timberlake

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Inventor Wallace and his canine sidekick Gromit have set up a pest-control service, and are called in to stop rabbits overrunning a garden show. However, the pair are overwhelmed when a destructive giant bunny arrives on the scene, while an interfering aristocrat contrives to make matters worse. Nick Parks Oscar-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Peter Sallis, Ralph Fiennes and Helena Bonham Carter

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Diabolical nemesis Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina target Anti-Villain League agent Gru, girlfriend Lucy, their girls Margo, Edith and Agnes and new addition Gru Jr. The family goes on the run while the Minions invade AVL HQ. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Will Ferrell

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Wide-eyed kitten Garfield is abandoned by his father Vic and left in an alleyway. Years later, when the ginger moggie has been adopted by long-suffering human Jon Arbuckle, a case of catnapping reunites the pet with his crooked father. Before long, the feline and doggy pal Odie are forced to take part in a heist. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Chris Pratt and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail obsessed with motor racing gets sucked into a cars exhaust pipe, and emerges having gained super-speed. This stroke of luck allows him to realise his dream of competing against human drivers in the prestigious Indianapolis 500 race. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The escaped zoo animals discover a plane and, following a swift repair job by the penguins, manage to escape the desolate shores of Madagascar. However, they crash-land on the plains of Africa and find themselves face-to-face with their wild counterparts for the first time. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer and Jada Pinkett Smith

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: A pet chameleon with an active imagination ends up lost in the desert. He makes his way to a lawless town of animals, where he is mistaken for a deadly gunslinger and made sheriff. He organises the townsfolk into a posse when bandits led by an evil rattlesnake steal their supply of water. Oscar-winning animated comedy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Dr Seuss The Lorax
programme.desc: A boy leaves his urban home in search of a real tree, and meets the reclusive industrialist who first created the city. The hermit tells the story of a grumpy forest creature who tried to stop him destroying the trees, and inspires the youngster to undo the damage that has been done. Animated fantasy based on the childrens book, with the voices of Danny DeVito, Zac Efron and Ed Helms

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling koalas attempt to save his theatre with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates, while the finalists of the contest find that their lives will never be the same again. Animated comedy, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane, Scarlett Johansson, John C Reilly, Taron Egerton, Jennifer Saunders and Jennifer Hudson

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: When their fiendish foes unite against them once more, Batman and Robin attempt to take them down. Animated adventure, with the voices of Adam West, Burt Ward and Julie Newmar, reprising their roles from the 1960s live action series

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: A prince and princess have been expected to marry each other all their lives, a prospect they dreaded as children but which they came to look forward to as adults. However, an evil wizard captures the princess and turns her into a swan. Everyone else believes she is dead, but her betrothed sets out to bring her home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Michelle Nicastro, Jack Palance and John Cleese

programme.desc: The dark knight joins forces with a team of superheroes including Green Arrow and The Flash to battle the mastermind behind a horse of deadly robotic animals. Animated superhero adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Chris Diamantopoulos
